subject: Re: Thanks for your refinance loan request, we are accepting your application
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$341,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
